Start Here

This page is for the moments your body goes into high alert. Use it to get grounded, then choose your next step.

1) Stabilize first

  • Drink waterRegulation starts with basics.
  • One small taskRestore control with one doable step.
  • Pause the spiralWrite facts only. No conclusions.
Reminder: you do not have to respond today just because you feel pressure.

2) Documentation basics

  • Date and timeRecord exactly when it happened.
  • Observable behaviorWhat was said or done, not what you think it means.
  • ImpactWhat changed, what was disrupted, what you had to do next.
Keep language neutral. Neutral reads as credible.

3) Choose the next page

  • Go to ResourcesTemplates, scripts, and guides.
  • Go to BlogHealing education and reflection.
  • Go to ContactRequest a worksheet or topic.
